item.title: Found a Mastodon CLI
item.description: Last week I created my own Go program to send toots to Mastodon but now I stumbled across a full fledged CLI with a TUI https://toot.bezdomni.net/ Links: 202312311312
item.content:encoded:
Last week I created my own Go program to send toots to Mastodon but now I stumbled across a full fledged CLI with a TUI

https://toot.bezdomni.net/
